creator: Hyperconnect inc
descriptionHtml:
Azar allows you to talk and make friends with people from over 190 countries.

• Over 400 million downloads worldwide!
• More than 80 billion matches!
• Featured in Google Play Store in over 140+ countries!

▷ Discover & Connect!
Azar allows you to meet someone new at the turn of each swipe.
You can easily explore new cultures and people from all over the world.

- Meet new people from all over the world through live video calls (using 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi)
- Select the region and gender of your choice and start building new conversations
- Add new people to your friend list and spark conversations
- Send and receive messages/video calls with existing friends
- Don’t be afraid of foreign languages! Chats are translated in real time.

▷ Share Azar with people around you and make more connections
Please leave a review on the Google Play Store and Facebook. Your review will help make Azar a better service.

- Want more information? http://azarlive.com
- Updates on Azar? http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
- Want to follow Azar? https://instagram.com/azar_official
- Need help or have suggestions? https://help.azarlive.com/hc
- Business partnership inquiry? azar.business@hpcnt.com

▷ Creating a better and enjoyable community at Azar
The Azar team is committed to creating a service that anyone can use safely. We believe our users are able to meet new and genuine people with each swipe. Please respect other users and follow our community guidelines to keep the Azar community at its best!

▷ Protection of Personal Information
- All personal information is securely stored and not sold nor shared to third parties.
- Information other than what you write directly on the profile can not be seen by other users.
- Your detailed location is not shared with any other user or third parties.
- Please take caution when delivering sensitive information, because you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party once you connect through Azar.

title: Azar - Swipe, Match, Video Chat

container.value: Zip code 06164, ASEM TOWER, 517, Yeongdong-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

creator: Hyperconnect inc
descriptionHtml:
Azar allows you to talk and make friends with people from over 190 countries.

• Over 400 million downloads worldwide!
• More than 80 billion matches!

▷ Discover & Connect!
Azar allows you to meet someone new at the turn of each swipe.
You can easily explore new cultures and people from all over the world.

- Meet new people from all over the world through live video calls (using 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi)
- Select the region and gender of your choice and start building new conversations
- Add new people to your friend list and spark conversations
- Send and receive messages/video calls with existing friends
- Don’t be afraid of foreign languages! Chats are translated in real time.

▷ Share Azar with people around you and make more connections
Please leave a review on the App Store and Facebook. Your review will help make Azar a better service.

- Want more information? http://azarlive.com
- Updates on Azar? http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
- Want to follow Azar? https://instagram.com/azar_official
- Need help or have suggestions? https://help.azarlive.com/hc
- Business partnership inquiry? azar.business@hpcnt.com

▷ Creating a better and enjoyable community at Azar
The Azar team is committed to creating a service that anyone can use safely. We believe our users are able to meet new and genuine people with each swipe. Please respect other users and follow our community guidelines to keep the Azar community at its best!

▷ Protection of Personal Information
- All personal information is securely stored and not sold nor shared to third parties.
- Information other than what you write directly on the profile can not be seen by other users.
- Your detailed location is not shared with any other user or third parties.
- Please be cautious when sending sensitive information as you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party once you connect through Azar.

▷ Azar VIP is a monthly subscription. If you choose to purchase Azar VIP, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase, and your account will be charged the same amount within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period unless auto-renew is turned off. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

▷ The app requests the following permissions:
- Camera: Video calling, taking and saving profile pictures
- Microphone: Delivering sound during video calls
- Location: Used for location-based matching
- Contact: Sending invitation SMS to your friends
- Photo Library: Sending photos to your friends
- Notification: To stay up to date with friends requests, messages and video calls

- Privacy Policy: http://azarlive.com/home/privacypolicy.html
- Terms of Service: http://azarlive.com/home/termsofservice.html

Azar is a video chat app that allows you to match and meet people, connecting you instantly to millions of like-minded people near you and around the world. You no longer need to wait for a match to happen; just swipe left to instantly meet people and make meaningful connections.

▷ With Azar you can:
- have a funny encounter
- have a deep conversation
- meet new friends

If you are seeking a live connection in real time, rather than simply swiping through profiles without instant feedback - this is your app. Azar is full of surprises. You never know who you might run into next. Download now and try it yourself!

▷ Connect with new people and chat with strangers:
- Start swiping now and connect with other users live
- Use our gender and regional filters to talk to the people you want to meet live
- Add different backgrounds, filters and effects while chatting

▷ Discover new people:
- Use Azar Lounge to browse through users’ profiles
- Like the profiles you are interested in
- If someone likes your profile back – it’s an Azar match
- Go live and start communicating with these matches via text or video

With Azar, you can easily explore new cultures and meet people from all over the world. Chat with other users to learn more about their personalities and lives.

▷ Other key features:
- Add new people to your friends list and have a chat party
- Use the history feature to find and resume chatting with previous connections
- Don’t be afraid of foreign languages! Our built-in chat feature translates messages in real time

▷ Want to learn more?
Go to http://azarlive.com
Find us on Facebook and talk to us there: http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
Follow us on Instagram and leave us some likes: https://instagram.com/azar_official

Need help with your Azar account or have suggestions for new features? Message us at https://help.azarlive.com/hc

At Azar, we believe that true connections come from a first glimpse, a fun chat, a good talk, or simply from laughing together. This is why we seek to connect and introduce people from all over the world, not just by showing profiles, but also by creating spontaneous connections with people that have matching interests and preferences.

The well-being of our users and their experience is our highest priority. This is why our support team and moderation service is backed up by best-in-class AI software reviewing the activities on our platform 24/7 to ensure a fun and positive experience.

We believe that people want to meet other people, not only in a dating context, but also to have a good time, just talk and to find some entertainment in real time. This is what we designed Azar for. The beauty of human connection is what drives us to make our product better with each video chat that takes place.

Azar provides a variety of in-app purchases and subscriptions that give you more control over who you can meet. If you choose to purchase an Azar subscription, payment will be charged to your Play Store account after purchase confirmation. Your account will be charged the subscription amount within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, unless auto-renewal is turned off. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase.

title: Azar - Swipe, Match, Video Chat

container.value: Zip code 06164, ASEM TOWER, 517, Yeongdong-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

creator: Hyperconnect inc
descriptionHtml:
Azar is a video chat app that allows you to connect instantly with millions of like-minded people near you and around the world. You no longer need to wait for a match to happen; just swipe left to instantly create meaningful connections.

▷ With Azar you can:
- have a funny encounter
- have a deep conversation
- make new friends
- browse user profiles

If you are seeking a live connection in real-time, this is your app. Azar is full of surprises. You never know who you might run into next. Download now, and try it yourself!

▷ Connect with new people:
- Start swiping now and connect with other users live
- Use our gender and regional filters to talk to the people you want to meet
- Add different backgrounds, filters and effects while chatting

▷ Discover new people:
- Use Azar Lounge to browse recommended user profiles
- Like profiles and if they like you back it’s an Azar match
- Have matches? Start polite conversation via text or video
- Don’t want to share your profile? No problem, feel free to opt-out

With Azar, you can easily explore new cultures and meet people from all over the world. Browse and chat with other users to learn more about their personalities and lives.

▷ Other key features:
- Add new people to your friends list and create meaningful connections
- Use the history feature to find and resume chatting with previous connections
- Don’t be afraid of foreign languages! Our chat feature translates messages in real-time

▷ Want to learn more?
Go to http://azarlive.com
Find us on Facebook and talk to us there: http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
Follow us on Instagram and leave us some likes: https://instagram.com/azar_official

Need help with your Azar account or have suggestions for new features? Message us at https://help.azarlive.com/hc

At Azar, we believe that true connections come from a first glimpse, a fun chat, a good talk, or simply from laughing together. This is why we seek to connect and introduce people from all over the world. Spontaneously connect with people with shared interests.

The well-being of our users and their experience is our highest priority. This is why our support team and moderation service is backed up by best-in-class AI software reviewing the activities on our platform 24/7 to ensure a fun and positive experience.

We believe that people want to meet other people not only in a dating context but also to have a good time and find some entertainment in real-time. This is what we designed Azar for. The beauty of human connection is what drives us to make our product better with each video chat that takes place.

Azar provides a variety of in-app purchases and subscriptions that give you more control over who you can meet. If you choose to purchase an Azar subscription, payment will be charged to your Play Store account after purchase confirmation. Your account will be charged the subscription amount within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period unless auto-renewal is turned off. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase.

▷ User Safety & Privacy:
We has been focusing on better matching system and improving user experience based on technology since the beginning of its launch. With users being the most valuable asset, we prioritizes in providing a safe environment for them, leading to a comprehensive operation of the following three items from dedicated Azar Team.

- User ecosystem: We're establishing a virtuous cycle among users by providing an easy reporting system which pops up prior to any abusive actions and compensating users for reporting.

- Heuristic monitoring: Hundreds of agents perform 24-hour monitoring and work towards solving problems raised by users with unpleasant experience, in the shortest time possible. To best protect users' privacy, the agents are not monitoring the matches directly.

- Technology-based user management: With machine learning technology, any inappropriate images are being filtered out prior to getting matched. Also, AI technology is used to protect passive users with hesitance to reporting. Since AI technology recognizes images on the screen without going through a server, it automatically questions the users who are likely to have had an unpleasant experience, in order to induce reports.

▷ Other key features:
- Add new people to your friends list and create meaningful connections
- Use the history feature to find and resume chatting with previous connections

- Use our filters to talk to the people you want to meet

With Azar, you can easily explore new cultures and meet people from all over the world. Connect and chat with other users to learn more about their personalities and lives.

▷ User Safety & Privacy:
We has been focusing on better matching system and improving user experience based on technology since the beginning of its launch. With users being the most valuable asset, we prioritizes in providing a safe environment for them, leading to a comprehensive operation of the following three items from dedicated Azar Team.

- User ecosystem: We're establishing a virtuous cycle among users by providing an easy reporting system which pops up prior to any abusive actions and compensating users for reporting.

- Heuristic monitoring: Hundreds of agents perform 24-hour monitoring and work towards solving problems raised by users with unpleasant experience, in the shortest time possible. To best protect users' privacy, the agents are not monitoring the matches directly.

title: Azar - Video Chat

container.value: Zip code 06164, ASEM TOWER, 517, Yeongdong-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

creator: Hyperconnect inc
descriptionHtml:
Azar is a video chat app that instantly connects you with millions of others nearby and around
the world. On Azar, you never know who you might meet!

▷ With Azar, you can :
- Have real conversations through live video chat.
- Watch videos on Live everyday.
- Browse for potential matches on Lounge.

Experience the beauty of immediate human connection on Azar.

Azar gives you the chance to:

▷ Connect via video chat
- Swipe to meet people online.
- Use our gender and regional filters to talk to the people you want to meet.
- React with our emojis while chatting.

▷ Observe and participate on LIVE
- Become a host and meet new people.
- Participate as a guest and talk with Live hosts.
- Send a gift to the hosts you like!

▷ Discover people on LOUNGE
- Browse our diverse collection of profiles.
- Send messages to those you like!

▷ Personalize and show your interests
- Add fun backgrounds, filters, and effects while chatting.
- Add hashtags and select your mood before matching.

▷ Want to learn more? Or need help with your Azar account?
Go to http://azarlive.com
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/azar_official
Message us: https://help.azarlive.com/hc

The experience and well-being of our users is our highest priority. Our support team and moderation services are backed by best-in-class AI software that reviews activity on our platform 24/7 to ensure a fun and positive experience.

Azar provides a variety of in-app purchases and subscription options that give you more control
over who you can meet. If you purchase an Azar subscription, your Play Store account will be
charged, and your subscription will auto-renew within 24-hours prior to the end of the current
period unless auto-renewal is turned off. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time after your
purchase has been completed by going to your settings in the Play Store.

Azar is a video chat app that instantly connects you with millions of others nearby and around
the world. On Azar, you never know who you might meet!

▷ With Azar, you can :
- Have real conversations through live video chat.
- Watch videos on Live everyday.
- Browse for potential matches on Lounge.

Experience the beauty of immediate human connection on Azar.

Azar gives you the chance to:

▷ Connect via video chat
- Swipe to meet people online.
- Use our gender and regional filters to talk to the people you want to meet.
- React with our emojis while chatting.

▷ Observe and participate on LIVE
- Become a host and meet new people.
- Participate as a guest and talk with Live hosts.
- Send a gift to the hosts you like!

▷ Discover people on LOUNGE
- Browse our diverse collection of profiles.
- Send messages to those you like!

▷ Personalize and show your interests
- Add fun backgrounds, filters, and effects while chatting.
- Add hashtags and select your mood before matching.

▷ Want to learn more? Or need help with your Azar account?
Go to http://azarlive.com
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/azar.application
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/azar_official
Message us: https://help.azarlive.com/hc

The experience and well-being of our users is our highest priority. Our support team and moderation services are backed by best-in-class AI software that reviews activity on our platform 24/7 to ensure a fun and positive experience.

Azar provides a variety of in-app purchases and subscription options that give you more control
over who you can meet. If you purchase an Azar subscription, your Play Store account will be
charged, and your subscription will auto-renew within 24-hours prior to the end of the current
period unless auto-renewal is turned off. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time after your
purchase has been completed by going to your settings in the Play Store.

You never know who you might meet next!

- Have real conversations through 1:1 video chat
- Browse profiles in the Lounge and follow or message anyone who catches your eye

- Azar lets you access a variety of fun features for free, but customizing who you meet by gender and region filter is available through our subscription

TRY PICK&MATCH!
Don’t Randomly Monkey around!
With Pick&Match, you can instantly browse profiles of friends who are online now
Select someone interesting, and your video chat will begin as soon as they’re ready!

INTRODUCING THE AZAR BADGE
Check out the badge awarded to active users who consistently show respect and kindness on Azar!

Azar provides tools that help keep you safer
- Moderation in Match & User Blocking: Matches that don't meet our safety guidelines are automatically canceled
- In-Match Blur: We detected inappropriate content and temporarily covered the screen

The experience and well-being of our users is our highest priority. Our support team and moderation services are backed by best-in-class AI software that reviews activity on our platform 24/7 for a fun and positive experience.

So, What are you waiting for? Slide and find your new friends with Azar today!
